rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use dc:title from the Dublin Core ontology instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This is the title (subject line) of the Post. Note that for a Post within a threaded discussion that has no parents, it would detail the topic thread.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: title

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Points to a Usergroup that has certain access to this Space.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_usergroup

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A feed (e.g., RSS, Atom, etc.) pertaining to this resource (e.g., for a Forum, Site, User, etc.).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: feed

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use content:encoded from the RSS 1.0 content module instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The encoded content of the Post, contained in CDATA areas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: content_encoded

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links to the next revision of this Item or Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: next_version

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links to an Item or Post which this Item or Post is a reply to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: reply_of

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use dcterms:isPartOf from the Dublin Core ontology instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A resource that the subject is a part of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: part_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The URI of a file attached to a Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: attachment

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User who has this Role.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: function_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An online account (User) in an online community site.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: User

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Container that a User is subscribed to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subscriber_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An article or message that can be posted to a Forum.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Post

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User who is subscribed to this Container.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_subscriber

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A container for a series of threaded discussion Posts or Items.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Thread

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An Item that the User is a creator of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: creator_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Container (or Forum) that this Container (or Forum) is a child of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_parent

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Site that hosts this Forum.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_host

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A URI of a document which contains this SIOC object.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: link

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A child Container (or Forum) that this Container (or Forum) is a parent of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: parent_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Forum that User is a moderator of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: moderator_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An electronic mail address of the User, encoded using SHA1.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email_sha1

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Role that this User has.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_function

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Forum that this Role applies to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_scope

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links to a previous revision of this Item or Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: previous_version

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The name of a SIOC instance, e.g. a username for a User, group name for a Usergroup, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: name

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Forum that is hosted on this Site.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: host_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User who is a moderator of this Forum.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_moderator

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User that this Container is owned by.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_owner

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Refers to the foaf:Agent (or foaf:Person) who owns this sioc:User online account.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: account_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The number of replies that this Post has. Useful for where the reply structure is absent.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: num_replies

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use foaf:name or foaf:firstName from the FOAF vocabulary instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: First (real) name of this User. Synonyms include given name or christian name.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: first_name
Item
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A content Item that can be posted to or created within a Container.
The number of times this Item, Thread, User profile, etc. has been viewed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: num_views

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Space that the Usergroup has access to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: usergroup_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An identifier of a SIOC concept instance. For example, a user ID. Must be unique for instances of each type of SIOC concept within the same site.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: id

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use dcterms:modified from the Dublin Core ontology instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: When this was modified, in ISO 8601 format.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modified_at

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property has been renamed. Use sioc:usergroup_of instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: group_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Usergroup that this User is a member of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: member_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This is the User who made this Item.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_creator

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Site that User is an administrator of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: administrator_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Role is a function of a User within a scope of a particular Forum, Site, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Role

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note associated with this Post, for example if it has been edited by a User.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: note

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An Item that this User has modified.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: modifier_of

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use sioc:content or other methods (AtomOwl, content:encoded from RSS 1.0, etc.) instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content of the Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: description

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The content of the Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: content

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Post may have a sibling or a twin that exists in a different Forum, but the siblings may differ in some small way (for example, language, category, etc.). The sibling of this Post should be self-describing (that is, it should contain all available information).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sibling

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use dc:subject from the Dublin Core ontology for text keywords and sioc:topic if the subject can be represented by a URI instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Keyword(s) describing subject of the Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: subject

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Related Posts for this Post, perhaps determined implicitly from topics or references.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: related_to

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Community is a high-level concept that defines an online community and what it consists of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Community

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User who is an administrator of this Site.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_administrator

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Space is where data resides. It can be the location of a set of content item containers, e.g., on a website, desktop or fileshare.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Space
Container
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An area in which content Items are contained.
An Item that this Container contains.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: container_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Next Item or Post in a given Container sorted by date.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: next_by_date

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The IP address used when creating this Item. This can be associated with a creator. Some wiki articles list the IP addresses for the creator or modifiers when the usernames are absent.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ip_address

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links extracted from hyperlinks within a SIOC concept, e.g., Post or Site.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: links_to

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A discussion area on which Posts or entries are made.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Forum

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A resource which belongs to this data Space.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: space_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Previous Item or Post in a given Container sorted by date.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: previous_by_date

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User who has modified this Item.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_modifier

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Container owned by a particular User, for example, a weblog or image gallery.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: owner_of
Usergroup
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A set of User accounts whose owners have a common purpose or interest. Can be used for access control purposes.
A data Space which this resource is a part of.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_space

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Links either created explicitly or extracted implicitly on the HTML level from the Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: reference

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A topic of interest, linking to the appropriate URI, e.g., in the Open Directory Project or of a SKOS category.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: topic

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use foaf:name or foaf:surname from the FOAF vocabulary instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Last (real) name of this user. Synonyms include surname or family name.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: last_name

rdf:Description.dc:description:
SIOC (Semantically-Interlinked Online Communities) is an ontology for describing the information in online communities.
This information can be used to export information from online communities and to link them together. The scope of the application areas that SIOC can be used for includes (and is not limited to) weblogs, message boards, mailing lists and chat channels.
rdf:Description.dc:title: SIOC: An Ontology for Semantically-Interlinked Online Communities

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use dcterms:hasPart from the Dublin Core ontology instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An resource that is a part of this subject.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_part

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An electronic mail address of the User.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: email

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Role that has a scope of this Forum.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: scope_of

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A User who is a member of this Usergroup.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_member

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property is deprecated. Use dcterms:created from the Dublin Core ontology instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: When this was created, in ISO 8601 format.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: created_at

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An image or depiction used to represent this User.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: avatar

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A web-accessible data Space. It can be the location of an online community or set of communities, with Users and Usergroups creating Items in a set of Containers.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Site

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The Container which this Item belongs to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_container

rdf:Description.owl:versionInfo: This property has been renamed. Use sioc:has_usergroup instead.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_group

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Points to an Item or Post that is a reply or response to this Item or Post.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has_reply
